current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of Defense to develop procedures to share certain information with State
			 veterans agencies to facilitate the transition of members of the Armed
			 Forces from military service to civilian life, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Service Members Transition Improvement Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Service Members Transition Improvement Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Procedures for provision of certain information to State veterans agencies to facilitate
		the transition of members of the Armed Forces from military service to civilian
		life

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall develop procedures to share the information
		described in subsection (b) on members of the Armed Forces who are separating
		from the Armed Forces with State veterans agencies in electronic data format as a
			 means of facilitating the
		transition of members of the Armed Forces from military service to civilian
		life.

text.#text:
The information described in this subsection with
		respect to a member is as follows:

The procedures required by subsection (a) shall include a requirement for consent of a member
			 before sharing information about the member.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall ensure that the information shared	with State veterans agencies in accordance
			 with the procedures required by subsection (a) is only shared by such
			 agencies with county government veterans service offices for such purposes
			 as the

shall specify for the administration and delivery of
			 benefits.
a report on the progress of the

on sharing
			 information with State veterans agencies as described in subsection (a).

text.#text:
Not
		later than one year after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

The report required by paragraph (1) shall
		include the following:
A description of the procedures developed under subsection (a).
A description of the activities carried out by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may have for legislative or administrative action to improve
			 the sharing of information as described in subsection (a).

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2810 IS: Service Members Transition Improvement Act of 2014
